nodes.documentation:
getDonorDonation only retrieves a specific donation by a donor. To retrieve the full donation
history by donor, it would require looping of entire Transaction[] mapped to donor address
nodes.name: getDonorDonation

getCampaignDonation(uint256,uint256).notice: getCampaignDonation only retrieves a specific donation within a campaign. To retrieve the full donation history of the campagin, it would require looping of entire Transaction[] mapped to campaignId
